com.project.smartpumpgui

Class SearchResultsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.project.smartpumpgui.SearchResultsAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class SearchResultsAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Extends the BaseAdapter class and provides a custom adapter for mapping a StationSearchResult to a list item.
    See Also:
    SearchResultsActivity
